sentences.en: a fruit and veg stall
sentences.cn: 水果蔬菜摊位

sentences.en: A heifer bellowed in her stall.
sentences.cn: 小母牛在牛栏里吼叫。

sentences.en: a market stall
sentences.cn: 市场摊位

sentences.en: An inexperienced pilot may easily stall a plane.
sentences.cn: 没有经验的飞行员会很容易使飞机失速下降。

sentences.en: Either stall or surge may result in combustor blowout.
sentences.cn: 不管是喘振或者爆音,都将引起燃烧室的熄火.

sentences.en: He ekes out a living with a market stall.
sentences.cn: 他靠摆摊勉强糊口。

sentences.en: He is over in his stall, looking very peaceful.
sentences.cn: 他在马棚里, 看来十分安详.

sentences.en: He knows how to stall off the applicants for the houses.
sentences.cn: 他很晓得怎样敷衍打发申请住房的人.

sentences.en: He sold boots on a market stall.
sentences.cn: 他在集市上摆摊卖靴子。

sentences.en: He was just stalling for time .
sentences.cn: 他只是在拖延时间。

sentences.en: If you try to start off in top gear you'll stall.
sentences.cn: 要是刚一发动就用最高挡,那就会熄火.

sentences.en: Quit stalling and answer my question!
sentences.cn: 别拖延时间，快回答我的问题！

sentences.en: She sells fruits at a market stall.
sentences.cn: 她在市场的货摊上卖水果.

sentences.en: The car engine may stall as we go up the hill.
sentences.cn: 爬山时,汽车发动机可能发生故障.

sentences.en: The car kept stalling.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车老熄火。

sentences.en: The engines would stall when you stepped on the gas.
sentences.cn: 你一踩大油门,那引擎就要发生障碍.

sentences.en: The opening of a market stall is governed by municipal fiat.
sentences.cn: 开设市场摊位受市政法令管制.

sentences.en: The owner of the stall, a large, thuggish man, grabbed Dai by the collar.
sentences.cn: 摊主是个野蛮凶狠的大块头，他一把抓住了戴的衣领。

sentences.en: Use the brake gently or you'll stall the engine.
sentences.cn: 轻踩刹车,不然的话发动机会停机的.

sentences.en: Your foot falls off the pedal and you stall the car.
sentences.cn: 你的脚离开踏板，汽车便会熄火。

words.tran_cn: 拖延；使停转；使陷于泥中

phrases.tran_cn: (英)明确（某人）对某个问题的立场

trans.tran_cn: 货摊，托辞，畜栏，（房间内的）小隔间
trans.tran_en: a table or a small shop with an open front, especially outdoors, where goods are sold

trans.tran_cn: 熄火； 拖延， 推迟
trans.tran_en: to deliberately delay because you are not ready to do something, answer questions etc
